desc.short: A 2D fighitng game that rewards patientece and well timed attacks through its unique stamina system. I'm currently developing and showcasing this project at events.
desc.full: Knockout is a 2D fighting game where players go head to head in a best of 9 match. The game's stamina system handles damage calculation and limits how many defensive/offesnive actions you can perform in a short period.
desc.additional: Initialy a school project I created Knockout to explore the core gameplay of games like Super Smash Bros, Nidhogg and Tower Fall Acension. The goal was to replicate the feelings that those games gave off, something I like to refer to as the couch game experience. I'm now working on the redesign and commercial development of this project.

desc.short: A action game that challenges the players visual perception and rhythm. Invisible projectiles spawn to the rythm of the music, use your pulse to spot them and survive till the end of the song!
desc.full: Pulse is a minimal action/rythm game where players dodge projectiles along a circular track. The projectiles spawn in sync with the music and are camoflouged!. Projectiles become visible when your pulse that radiates from the circular track passes over them, making Pulse a game that not only tests your rhythm and reaction time, but also one that tests your perception.
desc.additional: Pulse was primarily inspired by Super Hexagon and was a project I took on to learn how to integrate audio to influence primary game systems.

desc.short: Explore the world of cyber-space in Continuum, a virtual reality physics based puzzle platformer. #Hacktheworld
desc.full: Continuum is a cyber themed, virtual reality physics based puzzle platformer. This prototype was built for my VR Studio class alongside 3 other group members. The prototype features 3 levels and tutorial. For this project we were faced with the VR locomotive issue and try to think of designs that justified the action of teleporting to move. Thus resulting in the physics simulation of throwing a teleport pad, acting as both a means of movement and challenge a for the player. This game 1 of 3 Virtual Reality games featured in the NYU 2017 End of Year Show

desc.short: Take to the skies in FLIGHT CLUB, a 1v1 action game, where victory is just a hop and drop away! Challenge your friends -- drop bombs, raise hell, and eliminate your opponent! BOMBS AWAY!
Endlessly slay undead creatures of the night and collect valuable soul gems along the way.
